metadata.title: Friday, 25th July, 2025
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development and Social Services
questions.section: 7. GROUPED QUESTIONS FOR ORAL ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 83)
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to ratify and domesticate the African Disability Protocol; and
(a) if so, when the plans will be implemented. 394 Mr Tayengwa (Kabwata) - to ask the Minister of Community Development and Social Services:
(a) why the Government has not issued a Statutory Instrument to operationalise the provision of services to persons with disabilities, as required by the Persons with Disabilities Act No.6 of 2012;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to amend the Act; and
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
